name: Grand Expectation
description: When your Bennett, who has this card equipped, creates an Inspiration Field, its DMG Bonus is now always active and will no longer have an HP restriction.
descriptionraw: When your $[A1303], who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113031]</color>, its DMG Bonus is now always active and will no longer have an HP restriction.
descriptionreplaced: When your Bennett, who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>Inspiration Field</color>, its DMG Bonus is now always active and will no longer have an HP restriction.
